title: Ambiance
description: Radiant City, a beautiful city filled with brilliant and friendly people. This utopian community functions perfectly thanks to the support of Ambiance, a worldwide company devoted to well-being of mankind whose base rests in the mountains of this small American City.Suddenly, this utopia devolves into disarray and panic as zombies and bio-organic monsters sprout up around the city and escape becomes impossible. A small group of survivors must face several obstacles to find the truth that lurks beneath the city. In the newly formed dystopia, who will make it out alive and who will make it out undead?
author: Lex Firkey
